metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7153 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered inwasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::processFunctions() in wasm/wasm-binary.cpp (whencalling wasm::WasmBinaryBuilder::getFunctionIndexName) in Binaryen 1.38.22.A crafted input can cause segmentation faults, leading todenial-of-service, as demonstrated by wasm-opt.

criterions.comment: binaryen package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
